Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 20th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/13/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Won Cy Young in 2015, going 21-3, 2.64 ERA...
Injured on 4/2/2016 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 5/17/2016 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/26/2017 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/10/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $12,150,999 per year...
Injured on 5/14/2018 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
